pr_title: Add support for domain allow/deny list for HTTPInputSource

timeline.bodyText: it would be nice to differentiate between NULL vs EMPTY allowList ... null meaning everything is allowed and empty meaning nothing is allowed , so that a user can just set the allowList to empty to fully disable reading from anywhere.. they can add things to it as they see fit later on.
